list.title: Subscriptions & saved cards
list.emptySaved: This card is not saved anywhere
list.missingRightsSubscription: You do not have permission to view subscriptions for this card. Access can be granted by the account owner.
list.missingRightsSaved: You do not have permission to view which merchants have this card saved. Access can be granted by the account owner.
list.missingRightsBlocked: You do not have permission to view subscriptions for this card or which merchants have this card saved. Access can be granted by the account owner.

detail.blockingToggleDescription: Turning this off will also block all future payments to this merchant.

savedAtMerchant.title: We will block payments to this merchant
savedAtMerchant.description: We always recommend removing the card directly with the merchant.
savedAtMerchant.info: Removing this saved card will also block all future payments made with this card to this merchant.

recurring.title: Payments will no longer go through, but this does not cancel the subscription
recurring.description: To avoid any potential debt, we recommend cancelling the subscription directly with the merchant.
recurring.info: Blocking this payment will also block all future payments made with this card to this merchant.

savedAtMerchant.title: We will unblock payments to this merchant
savedAtMerchant.description: The merchant will be able to charge payments to your card.

recurring.title: We will unblock payments to this merchant
recurring.description: The merchant will be able to charge recurring payments to your card.

authorization.titleUnblock: Confirm payment unblocking with your PIN
authorization.titleBlock: Confirm the payment block with your PIN

blocked.title: Done! Payments have been blocked
blocked.subtitle: To avoid any outstanding balance, we recommend cancelling the subscription directly with the merchant.

error.title: Sorry, something went wrong
error.subtitle: We canâ€™t continue right now. Please try again later.

selectedCardNotActive.title: This card cannot be displayed in this section.
selectedCardNotActive.detail: We will display the card here after it is activated.
